data.text: I am a rose of Sharon,2:1 Sharon Plain is a region in the coastal plain of Israel
Like a lily among the thorns
Like an apricot tree among the trees of the forest
He has brought me to the house of wine,2:4 That is, the banquet hall
His left hand is under my head,
O daughters of Jerusalem, I adjure you
My beloved is like a gazelle or a young stag.
For now the winter is past;
The flowers have appeared in the countryside;
The fig tree ripens its figs;
O my dove in the clefts of the rock,
My beloved is mine and I am his;
Before the day breaks and shadows flee,
